Introduction

QBS (Korean: 큐비스; Japanese: キュービス) is the second sub unit and Japan based unit of girl group T-ara. The unit consisted of the member Qri and former members Boram and Soyeon. QBS stands for Qri, Boram, and Soyeon.

They debuted on June 26, 2013 with the single album "Like The Wind"
